snippet.title: Sucker For Love: Date to Die For - Official Release Date Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Put the ‘love’ in 'Lovecraftian horror. Check out gameplay and more from Sucker For Love: Date to Die For, an upcoming 1990s anime-inspired visual novel game. Avoid the fanatical cultists and survive dangerous rituals to escape the Black Woods with your life when Sucker For Love: Date to Die For launches on PC on February 14, 2024.
